price: 56. »A quienes rechacen la verdad, los castigaré con severidad en esta vida y en la otra, y no tendrán quienes les auxilien.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَأُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna kafarū fa-uʿadhibuhum ʿadhāban shadīdan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
